query.value: WITH AAA as ( select FROM_PRODID,max(LOB_ID) as LOB_ID from (         select distinct          CONCAT(CONCAT(COUNTRY_CD,LEDGER_CD),LERU_ID) as FROM_PRODID,         LOB_ID         from         BDWDM.DEPT_REF_UV         where LERU_ID = DPT_ID          and status='O' and lob_Id!=''   ) b3 group by FROM_PRODID having count(*)=1 ) select  b1.COUNTRY_CD,  b1.LEDGER_CD,  b1.LERU_ID,  b1.FROM_PRODID, b1.EBU_SOP_IND, b1.DPT_TYP_CD, cast(case when b1.LOB_ID ='-1' and b2.lob_id is not null then b2.lob_id else b1.LOB_ID end as char(3))as LOB_ID from(  select distinct  COUNTRY_CD,   LEDGER_CD,   LERU_ID,   FROM_PRODID,  EBU_SOP_IND,  DPT_TYP_CD,  cast (case when rn=1 then LOB_ID else '-1' end as char(3))as LOB_ID from (  select   COUNTRY_CD,    LEDGER_CD,    LERU_ID,    FROM_PRODID,   EBU_SOP_IND,   LOB_ID,   DPT_TYP_CD,   dense_rank() over(partition by COUNTRY_CD,LEDGER_CD,LERU_ID,FROM_PRODID order by LOB_ID asc) +   dense_rank() over(partition by COUNTRY_CD,LEDGER_CD,LERU_ID,FROM_PRODID order by LOB_ID desc) - 1 as rn  from (   SELECT DISTINCT   COUNTRY_CD,    LEDGER_CD,    LERU_ID,    CONCAT(CONCAT(COUNTRY_CD,LEDGER_CD),LERU_ID) as FROM_PRODID,   EBU_SOP_IND,   LOB_ID,   DPT_TYP_CD   FROM    BDWDM.DEPT_REF_UV   where status='O'  ) a1 ) a2  ) b1 left join AAA b2 on b1.FROM_PRODID = b2.FROM_PRODID with ur
